transcript: 911, what's your emergency? I'm hiding in my bathroom. My husband is drunk and threatening me with a knife. He's been hitting me. I'm scared he's going to kill me. Please send help quickly.
I need an ambulance. My neighbor fell off a ladder and hit his head. He's bleeding and not fully conscious. He keeps forgetting where he is.
There's a car accident on Main Street near the grocery store. One car is flipped over. I don't know if anyone is hurt, but it looks bad.
I'd like to report a noise complaint. My neighbors have been playing loud music for hours and it's past midnight. I've asked them to turn it down but they won't listen.
I'm lost in the woods. I was hiking on the trail but went off path and now I can't find my way back. It's getting dark and my phone battery is at 10%.
